summary: Adds werewolf recolors that match vanilla hair options, and dynamically applies them to player and NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
This mod requires SKSE
Adds 15 werewolf color variations, each of which match the vanilla hair color options.

Members of the Circle and the player will transform into the werewolf that matches their hair color. Use the MCM to add other werewolves to the system or change assigned fur color. Werewolf followers will transform when you do! 
Random encounter werewolves should have a randomly selected fur color. 

Playing an Argonian, or using a mod that gives your character a non-vanilla hair color? You can still manually select the werewolf color of your choice in the MCM.
author: Henshu
